name: The Half Creature, Half Camera Game
name_original: The Half Creature, Half Camera Game
description:
THE HALF CREATURE HALF CAMERA GAME! Use your limbs to move and your big ol' camera head to uncover hidden passages!

Game A Week #7

Seventh game as part of RMIT's game a week, this week the theme was "Camerawork".

----------------------------------------------------------

I like the concept I came up with for this week but kind of wish I had more time to flesh it out, this game was done over three days instead of the whole week unfortunately.

CONTROLS

move - WASD

jump - SPACE

take photo - E

----------------------------------------------------------

ACTIVE RAGDOLL BASE by Evan Greenwood

MUSIC by YD - Where Was I?
